vlive.korean: [마요시리즈가 빠지는 건 인류의 손해라서요] "형이 뭔데!" "Who are you to tell me what to do"? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [VICTON] 🐶댕댕이의 빅토니들 관찰일지📚 ※주의: 귀여워서 솜털로 지구 격파 가능 (SEUNGSIK mimicking members)
vlive.english: "Who are you to tell me what to do"?

vlive.korean: [물어줬으므로 10만 원 손해!] - 우리 남준이를 믿어라! - 아니, 근데... [That's his own loss] - Trust RM. - But... 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2020 - EP.94
vlive.english: [That's his own loss] - Trust RM. - But...

vlive.korean: 나랑 쟈니 형을 DJ로 쓰지 않는 건 참 손해다! And that they don't use me and JOHNNY as the DJ is a loss on their part! 듣기 View video NCT : D💚💚J
vlive.english: And that they don't use me and JOHNNY as the DJ is a loss on their part!

vlive.korean: 진짜로 정신적인 손해배상과... Sue for emotional distress, and... 듣기 View video V PICK! : [SF9] 찰떡콩떡 첫 게스트와 함께하는 세상귀여운저주방송 찌뽕합니다!!! (YoungBin&JaeYoon talking with fans)
그래도 손해인가? 그래도 손해인가? Would that be your loss? Would it still be your loss? 듣기 View video BTS : BTS Live : EAT Jin
vlive.english: Would that be your loss? Would it still be your loss?

examples.korean: He was ordered to pay damages totalling ￡30,000. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 총 3만 파운드의 손해 배상금을 지불하라는 명령을 받았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He was ordered to pay damages totalling ￡30,000. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: to sue sb for damages 듣기 Add to Wordbook …를 상대로 손해 배상 소송을 제기하다 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: to sue sb for damages Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: We lost on that deal. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리는 그 거래에서 손해를 보았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We lost on that deal. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: We are now operating at a loss. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리는 현재 손해를 보면서 운영하고 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We are now operating at a loss. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He was awarded punitive damages. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 징벌적 손해 배상금을 판정받았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
